sys_element_mapping.value: task_name=verify^hardware_disposal={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Verify the assets planned for disposal^description=Verify the planned assets in the related list using verify UI action. Please close the task after verification.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.assigned_to}}^sys_domain={{Created_1.current.sys_domain}}

hardware_disposal={{Created_1.current}}^task_name=confirm^short_description=Confirmation from vendor^description=Please close the task after receiving confirmation from vendor.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.assigned_to}}^sys_domain={{Created_1.current.sys_domain}}

hardware_disposal={{Created_1.current}}^task_name=schedule^short_description=Provide Vendor, Vendor order ID, Scheduled date and Pickup contact name^description=Provide Vendor, Vendor order ID and Scheduled date on the Hardware disposal request. Please close the task after scheduling.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.assigned_to}}^sys_domain={{Created_1.current.sys_domain}}

task_name=depart^hardware_disposal={{Created_1.current}}^short_description=Select the assets departuring for disposal^description=Select the verified assets for departure in the related list using depart UI action. Please close the task after selecting the assets for departure. Departed assets cannot be removed from the hardware disposal order. Allocations of the departing assets will be retired. Assets will be removed from exisiting contracts.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.assigned_to}}^sys_domain={{Created_1.current.sys_domain}}

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get attachments on Disposal Documentation task
Copy disposal documents to hardware disposal request

sys_element_mapping.value: hardware_disposal={{Created_1.current}}^task_name=documentation^short_description=Attach Disposal report and certificates of data destruction^description=Attach Disposal report and certificates of data destruction. Select the departed assets which are disposed in the related list using dispose UI action. Please close the task after selecting the disposed assets.^assigned_to={{Created_1.current.assigned_to}}^sys_domain={{Created_1.current.sys_domain}}

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Asset Departure task is created if Schedule Pickup is closed complete

logic_definition.display_value: Wait for a duration of time
Wait for a duration of time

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Disposal order is cancelled if Asset Departure task is closed incomplete
